/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A red car is parked on the right side of the street, its vibrant color contrasting with the muted tones of the surroundings. On the left side of the street, a solitary figure can be seen walking, adding a touch of human presence to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the city's blend of natural beauty and urban life.
